website_summaries.verdict: A good beginner-friendly heavy freestanding bag option for anyone wanting a new workout.
pros: Adjustable heavy bag height can be set between 53 and 65 inches
The poly-shell and internal foam are both comfortable to hit repeatedly
cons: Heavy base has a tendency to move around with each hit unless filled to the maximum level

customer_reviews.title: Great for small home bag
customer_reviews.text: Great for small home bag. We had to fill it almost all the way up to get it to be more sturdy. Overall happy with it. And it’s on the next to lowest night.. so, it can go higher. No baby was harmed in the making of this video ;)
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina pyl

customer_reviews.title: Not for adults
customer_reviews.text: Not sturdy enough for adults, I'm a 5'6" 140lbs female and this moves every time I hit or kick it. :(
customer_reviews.author: J. Berg

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Works good still moves around with 150 lbs of sand
customer_reviews.author: Coolbug

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for me as a five foot zero 100 ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for me as a five foot zero 100 lb adult. Love the adjustable bag height. Filled w sand and took exactly 150 lbs (3) 50 lb bags play sand. Best for punching. Round house, side kicks, front kicks doable but i can move bag slightly across carpet. Like the short height of the base... gives me more kicking and punching area at my height. Seller response time to my question was within seconds of my email. Great job!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Impossible to get the base filled with enough to make it solid. The top piece comes unattached really easily. Spend the extra money and buy up
customer_reviews.author: Christena Reinhard

customer_reviews.title: Not weighted enough
customer_reviews.text: If you are strong at all, you will punch this over, even with the base filled as directed. This would be great for young beginner or practice without full punches. I am a petite female and I can barely punch it.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Not heavy enough for side kicks
customer_reviews.text: This is not a heavy bag. I have to pull my front kicks and side kicks to keep from pushing it across the room. Other than that it is great for punching, round kicks and targeting your side and front kicks. I have used heavier bags in the dojo, but this is good enough for home.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Moves too much
customer_reviews.text: Filled the base with water but it still was sliding all over the floor. Returned it
customer_reviews.author: Daimyo

customer_reviews.title: perfect height for all sizes
customer_reviews.text: Very strong, perfect height for all sizes, kicking, punching, it gets a lot of attention and is holding up very well
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: So in love with my Century Cardio Wavemaster
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and great communication from the vendor. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Illy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for home gym
customer_reviews.text: Works great for a nice kickboxing work out. Perfect cost efficient option for a home gym without breaking the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unsturdy for Use
customer_reviews.text: Even filled all the way with water, it is very wobbly when you hit it and it moves around quite a bit. It also leaks water somehow when it moves. I am a beginner so not very strong and I can move it Few feet across the room in not many punches. I bought it because of the price and size, but if I knew how unstable it would be beforehand, I would have just paid more for the full size one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cardio Wavemaster
customer_reviews.text: Good product for what I paid for though I am short, this product was not as tall as I hoped, but still works well for my clientele, and to help them with balance issues...
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Gladu-Molina

customer_reviews.title: Kickboxing Bag
customer_reviews.text: The bag is sturdy and easy to assemble. There are options to change out the bag type (not included).
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie P. Calabria

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: quick delivery and easy set up just what i was looking for
customer_reviews.author: william watters

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for my daughter. Very pleased with product. Easy to assemble, fast delivery!
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Forker

customer_reviews.title: Expected more but useful.
customer_reviews.text: I expected this to be heavier. It moves a lot when it's hit.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great product wish it was a bit larger but all in all great workout tool
customer_reviews.author: Kade

customer_reviews.title: Awesome piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: The perfect size for my workout routune. Easy to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: PDV

customer_reviews.title: Great for the young martial artist
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my grandson, he loves it. Has multiple adjustable heights, the padding is very good, instead of using water, we filled it with cat litter and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Scott L. Havsy

customer_reviews.title: Add water or sand in the base
customer_reviews.text: For people saying it moves when you hit it. You have to put sand, or water in the base.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Century Cardio Wavemaster, Black
product_meta.description: Ideal for cardio kickboxing workouts, the Cardio Wavemaster features a 40-inch tall bag made of durable, high-density foam and a poly shell. The longer bag and low-profile base allow for more kicks and strikes, while the base fills with sand or water and is rounded for easy roll relocation. Features four height adjustments from 53.5 inches to 65.5 inches.
feature_bullets: Longer bag and low-profile base allow for more kicks and strikes
Durable, high-density foam and a poly shell
One-year warranty on all Wavemaster training bags
